title: Finale
creator_credit: Michael Darlow, Robert Bas, Theodora Olembert and Triangle Productions
brief_description: A nostalgic look at the Marlborough Music Hall in North London. It was demolished and we see this being done interspersed with photographs of the famous music hall stars who played there and their special acts.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Darlow, Robert Bas, Theodora Olembert and Triangle Productions
